{{also|kuche}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|goh|chuhhina}}, from late {{inh|de|gem-pro|*kukinǭ}}, from {{der|de|VL.|*cocīna}}, from {{der|de|la|coquīna}}.
